lead_paragraph: Counts of attempted assault and attempted murder were brought against Anthony Pacherille, 16, who the authorities said shot a classmate and then himself.
snippet: Counts of attempted assault and attempted murder were brought against Anthony Pacherille, 16, who the authorities said shot a classmate and then himself.

headline.main: Two Hate Crime Charges in Cooperstown Shooting
headline.seo: Cooperstown Shooting Leads to 2 Hate Crime Charges
headline.print_headline: Two Hate Crime Charges in Cooperstown Shooting
